snippet: A young mother and her brother were sentenced Tuesday after they acknowledged putting the woman’s 9-month-old son on a four-lane highway outside Moscow in hopes he would get killed.
lead_paragraph: A young mother and her brother were sentenced Tuesday after they acknowledged putting the woman’s 9-month-old son on a four-lane highway outside Moscow in hopes he would get killed.

headline.main: Russia: Mother and Uncle Left Child to Die on Highway
headline.print_headline: Russia: Mother and Uncle Left Child to Die on Highway
